original_text: And now your two sons, who were born to you in the land of Egypt before I came to you in Egypt, are mine; Ephraim and Manasseh shall be mine, as Reuben and Simeon are.
korean_text: 내가 애굽으로 와서 네게 이르기 전에 애굽에서 네가 낳은 두 아들 에브라임과 므낫세는 내 것이라 르우벤과 시므온처럼 내 것이 될 것이요

sentences.original_text: who were born to you in the land of Egypt
before I came to you in Egypt
Ephraim and Manasseh shall be mine
sentences.korean_translation: 에브라임과 므낫세는 내 것이 될 것이라
